item.title: Teaching AI to Read and Group Like I Bookmark the Web: A Journey into Dynamic Topic Modeling
item.description: Quick Links: Dataset on HuggingFace The Topic Modeling Challenge You know that feeling when you have 50 browser tabs open, and you’re desperately trying to organize them into bookmark folders? “ML Papers To Read,” “Funny Cat Videos,” “Recipes I’ll Never Make”… We all have our system. And apparently, it’s such a universal problem that every tech company is launching their own solution - Arc Browser with its “Spaces,” Chrome with its tab groups, and about 500 extensions promising to color-code your digital hoarding habits into submission.
